sentences.en: CAVENDISH COLLEGE is proud of its multicultural student body which diversity of a cosmopolitan like London.
sentences.cn: 卡文迪什学院以拥有来自世界各地的留学生而自豪.

sentences.en: In short runningthe Cavendish . We may not be able to go bananas for much longer.
sentences.cn: 简单来说,板烟香蕉大限已到. 以后可能就没机会抓狂了.

sentences.en: It is verified through Cavendish experiment.
sentences.cn: 它是通过卡文迪许实验得到验证的.

sentences.en: Many of the genes which have saved the Cavendish may already have been lost.
sentences.cn: 许多能够拯救板烟香蕉的基因已经没了.

sentences.en: Miss Cavendish, you're looking a fair treat.
sentences.cn: 卡文迪什小姐, 你长得真美啊.

sentences.en: Moreover , he pushed the Cavendish to the peak in it's history.
sentences.cn: 从而把卡文迪什推上了其历史发展的巅峰.

sentences.en: Rutherford discovered α & amp ; � � rays when he studying in Cavendish laboratory.
sentences.cn: 在卡文迪什实验室留学时,他发现了α 与 β射线.

sentences.en: She strode off down the restaurant with Cavendish following close at her heels.
sentences.cn: 她大步向餐馆里面走去，卡文迪什紧随其后。

sentences.en: There were perfectly cogent reasons why Julian Cavendish should be told of the Major's impending return.
sentences.cn: 要将少校即将返回的消息告知朱利安·卡文迪什是有绝对充足的理由的。

sentences.en: You thought killing Cavendish would make me want to go out with you?
sentences.cn: 你认为杀掉卡文迪许会让我想和你约会?

trans.tran_cn: （一种压成饼状的）板烟，烟草饼
trans.tran_en: tobacco that has been sweetened and pressed into moulds to form bars
